title: variation: add FontRef::variations/instances APIs
description: Port swash-reference variation.rs surface: NormalizedCoord alias, Variation/Instance iteration, and FontRef helpers. Implementation can leverage moon_skrifa AxisCollection/NamedInstanceCollection for normalization + AVAR.
close_reason: Added Variation/Instance APIs and NormalizedCoord alias

title: Scale: support variable font coords (Setting + normalized_coords)
description: Port swash-reference Setting<T> parsing (u16/f32) and wire ScalerBuilder.variations/normalized_coords so ScaleContext passes LocationRef with coords to skrifa outlines/hinting.
close_reason: Added Setting parsers and wired ScalerBuilder variation coords support

title: Scale/bitmap: port PNG decode pipeline using moon_yazi zlib
description: swash-reference uses yazi to inflate PNG IDAT (zlib) when decoding embedded bitmap glyphs. Port scale/bitmap/png.rs behavior in MoonBit on top of moon_yazi, wire into renderer once bitmap/color bitmap sources are implemented.

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Ported swash-reference PNG decode pipeline and wired into scale_bitmap for sbix/cbdt PNG glyphs. Implemented decode_png in src/scale/bitmap_png.mbt (yazi zlib IDAT inflation + filters), added Mitchell resizer and EBDT 1bpp decoder in src/scale/bitmap.mbt, and added synthetic sbix+ebdt tests. Commit: 7a41969.

title: Scale: adopt moon_skrifa outlines/hinting to match swash-reference
description: Current ScaleContext/Scaler uses a manual glyf decoder fallback. Align with swash-reference by using moon_skrifa OutlineGlyphCollection draw + hinting (size/variations), and remove the manual TrueType glyf decoding path once moon_skrifa APIs are sufficient.
close_reason: Implemented skrifa hinting instance cache and integrated into scale builder

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Checked moon_skrifa 0.1.2: outline module now uses Double PathElement coords, introduces core package with GlyphId wrapper, and includes embedded TT hinting engine + parity tests. Updated moon_swash scale package imports/calls accordingly (now calling OutlineGlyphCollection::draw with DrawSettings and core.GlyphId).

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Implemented initial zeno-based Outline rendering: Render::render_into now rasterizes scaled outlines via moon_zeno Mask::with_scratch; Outline gained path() + embolden() port; GlyphId aligned to UInt16 like swash-reference; ScaleContext now holds render scratch state.

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Implemented COLR/CPAL layered color outline path (scale_color_outline_into + Render ColorOutline). Uses moon_skrifa color_glyphs/layers + color_palettes, rasterizes each layer to alpha mask and blits into RGBA via swash-reference blit port. Added Outline::get/Layer API and synthetic COLR/CPAL+glyf test. Commit: 166fce2.

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Added bitmap/color-bitmap scaling path: Scaler now supports has_bitmaps/has_color_bitmaps + scale_bitmap/scale_color_bitmap (StrikeWith selection), PNG decode + Mitchell resize, and Render now handles Source::Bitmap/ColorBitmap. Synthetic tests for sbix PNG + ebdt 1bpp. Commit: 7a41969.

title: Port swash-reference core: string/variation names, scale variations, metrics
description: Port remaining foundational modules to align moon_swash with swash-reference: string.rs, scale builder variation behavior, metrics.rs (incl proxies + variable adjustments).

title: string: port localized strings (StringId/LocalizedStrings/LocalizedString/Chars)
description: Port swash-reference src/string.rs APIs/behavior (name table parsing, language mapping, encodings, Chars iterator) and wire FontRef + variation instance name helpers.
close_reason: Ported string.rs (StringId/LocalizedStrings/LocalizedString) and wired Variation/Instance name helpers

title: scale: align ScalerBuilder::variations with swash-reference
description: Change ScaleContext/ScalerBuilder to store coords like swash-reference: variations(settings) iterates FontRef::variations and sets coords by axis index; normalized_coords replaces coords. Remove var_settings.
close_reason: Updated ScalerBuilder variations/normalized_coords to match swash-reference coords workflow

title: metrics: port MetricsProxy/Metrics/GlyphMetrics (+ var adjustments)
description: Port swash-reference src/metrics.rs including MetricsProxy::from_font/materialize_metrics/materialize_glyph_metrics, Metrics, GlyphMetrics and required internal tables (vorg/var etc).
notes:
Start porting swash-reference metrics.rs + required internal var/vorg/os2/post support

Done:
- src/metrics.mbt: MetricsProxy/Metrics/GlyphMetrics + FontRef::metrics/glyph_metrics
- src/font.mbt: FontRef table helpers (table_offset/head/os2/post/maxp/hhea/vhea)
- src/internal/head.mbt: Os2/Post parsing + Os2Flags
- src/internal/var.mbt: ItemVariationStore delta eval (MVAR/HVAR/VVAR)
- src/internal/vorg.mbt: VORG origin lookup
- src/metrics_test.mbt: tests for MVAR/HVAR + vertical metrics

Quality gates: moon check/test, moon info && moon fmt

title: Port swash-reference metadata: attributes, palette, strike
description: Continue strict port of swash-reference. Next modules: attributes.rs (stretch/weight/style + synthesis), palette.rs (CPAL/COLR), strike.rs (bitmap strikes).

title: attributes: port Attributes/Stretch/Weight/Style/Synthesis
description: Port swash-reference/src/attributes.rs and wire FontRef::attributes().
notes:
Start attributes.rs port

Done:
- src/attributes.mbt: port Attributes/Stretch/Weight/Style/ObliqueAngle/Synthesis + FontRef::attributes
- src/internal/head.mbt: add Os2::weight_class/width_class and Os2Flags::italic/oblique
- src/attributes_test.mbt: basic OS/2 flag + synthesize tests
Quality gates: moon test, moon info && moon fmt

title: palette: port CPAL/COLR palette APIs
description: Port swash-reference/src/palette.rs and any needed internal tables.
notes:
Start palette.rs port

Done:
- src/palette.mbt: port ColorPalettes/ColorPalette + Usability + FontRef::color_palettes
- src/palette_test.mbt: CPAL v0 color decoding test
Quality gates: moon test, moon info && moon fmt

title: strike: port BitmapStrike + strikes iterators
description: Port swash-reference/src/strike.rs (sbix/cblc/cbdt) and proxies.

title: Port swash-reference feature enumeration
description: Port swash-reference  and the minimal  types it depends on (Language/Script OpenType tag mapping).

title: text: port Language + Script tag mapping
description: Port swash-reference text language parsing and OpenType tag mapping needed by feature (Language::parse/from_opentype, Script::from_opentype + Script enum + tags table).

title: feature: port GSUB/GPOS writing systems
description: Port swash-reference feature/mod.rs + feature/at.rs + feature/util.rs for OpenType (GSUB/GPOS) writing systems and feature enumeration.

title: feature: port AAT (morx) writing systems
description: Port swash-reference feature/aat.rs for Apple Advanced Typography (morx + kern/kerx) writing systems and feature enumeration.
close_reason: AAT (morx) feature + DFLT writing system ported

title: shape: port swash-reference shaping
description: Strict port of swash-reference/src/shape/* into MoonBit, using skrifa/zeno/yazi where applicable.

title: shape: buffer + cluster
description: Port shape/buffer.rs + cluster.rs + partition.rs; provide Buffer API and basic tests.
notes: Implemented shape package skeleton: shaper builder/context (Direction/ShapeContext/ShaperBuilder/Shaper), partition shaper (font selector + options), and tests. Also added ClusterChar::new in text_cluster. Ran moon info && moon fmt, moon check, moon test.

title: shape: AT shaper
description: Port shape/at.rs + engine.rs integration for OpenType GSUB/GPOS shaping.
close_reason: OT shaping (GSUB/GPOS) port complete: at.rs + engine integration + shaper pipeline; moon check/test pass

title: shape: OT feature constants + groups
description: Port  + implement  and feature mask plumbing.

title: shape: GDEF table wrapper
description: Port GDEF parsing used by OT shaping (glyph class + mark attachment class).

title: shape: OT lookup apply (GSUB/GPOS)
description: Port  lookup cache + apply logic, and wire into .

title: shape: OT coverage cache (FeatureStore.coverage)
description: Port CoverageBuilder/BitSet from swash-reference/src/shape/at.rs so FeatureStore.covers(key,gid) can be used (lookup.coverage key), and wire builder to populate store.coverage + lookup.coverage.

title: shape: OT shaper pipeline (add_cluster/finish/shape_with)
description: Port swash-reference/src/shape/mod.rs shaper behavior for OT: add_cluster, finish, shape_with; ensure Engine::gsub/gpos are applied with correct stages/masks/ranges.
close_reason: Fix OT shaper pipeline compilation and align source-range handling: SourceRange::new, char->codepoint mapping, ShapeClass variant match; moon check/test pass

title: shape: AAT shaper
description: Port shape/aat.rs + morx/kerx/kern integration for AAT shaping.

comments.author: Milky2018
comments.text: Implemented AAT shaping: ported internal AAT parsers (morx/kerx/kern + state tables + tag->selector mapping), added shape/aat apply_morx/apply_kerx/apply_kern, integrated Engine/Shaper dispatch, and added tests (aat_lookup + kern format0 end-to-end). moon test passes.

title: text: port unicode + cluster
description: Port swash-reference/src/text/*: unicode properties, normalization (compose/decompose), cluster segmentation, and boundary analysis.

title: text: unicode properties
description: Port text/unicode.rs + unicode_data.rs + compose.rs minimal API (Properties, Codepoint, JoiningType, mirrors/brackets, compose/decompose).

title: text: cluster parser
description: Port text/cluster/* (Token/CharInfo/CharCluster/Parser + complex+myanmar rules).

title: text: analyze boundaries
description: Port text/analyze.rs for boundary analysis (word breaks, line breaks).

title: cache: port FontCache LRU for per-font proxies
description: Port swash-reference FontCache<T> (simple LRU by epoch) so ScaleContext can cache per-font proxies like metrics/color/bitmaps later.
